articles.title: People who’ve had Covid appear more likely to develop diabetes — here’s why that might be - The Indian Express
articles.description: Type 2 diabetes tends to develop slowly over time, and even type 1 diabetes can take months to years to show up. So it's likely to be some time before anyone can say definitively if COVID is leading to an increase in diabetes
